metadata.title: CVE-2014-5262 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the graph settings script(graph_settings.php) in Cacti 0.8.8b and earlier allows remote attackers toexecute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-8
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: cacti package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-8').
